# touchpadPrimary

**Instance Property**

The location of the player’s primary finger on the touchpad.

## Declaration

```swift
var touchpadPrimary: GCControllerDirectionPad! { get }
```

## Tracking finger locations

- **touchpadSecondary**: The location of the player’s secondary finger on the touchpad.

items.description: The location of the player’s secondary finger on the touchpad.
